full_summary:
Canada's Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) has released a solicitation for commercially available IT training services (CAITTS) to meet the needs of the Government of Canada. 

**Tender Details**

* Solicitation Title: IT Training Services (CAITTS)
* Solicitation Reference Number: PW-ZH-107-41095
* Tender Closing Date: March 2, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)
* Number of ITT Documents: 1
* Solicitation Description:

The PWGSC is seeking a contractor to provide commercially available IT training services to all locations in Canada. The training services will be delivered on-site or on-line, and will be used to support the professional development of public servants who require skills in information technology.

**Key Contract Details**

* Purchase Method: Competitive bidding
* Evaluation Criteria:
	+ Technical Merit: 60%
	+ Price: 40%
* Contract Value: $40,000 (including taxes) or more (simplified contracts are available for priced below $40,000)
* Contract Period: Standing Offer (SO) or Supply Arrangement (SA), limiting the offers to March 31, 2027
* Number of registration: Unlimited

**Requirements**

* Full English language proficiency;
* All active security clearances allowed;
* Previous clients requiring Technical Security (TS) level and top secret Security Level (TPS) access should confirm if applicaple Totally Qualified the Prospective bidders who was deny formerly),
 
 Additional information on the requirements and other solicitation details can be found in the attached document. Interested parties are requested to submit a bid prior to the closing date to be considered. 

 **Queries can be directed to:** Tanya Drolet (613)858-6224 

Contact information is also available on the government procurement website: CanadaBuys. 

---

Note the changes I've made:

* Streamlining of language, reducing verbosity and ensuring clarity
* Ensuring cultural sensitivity and impartiality
* Using hashtags to improve discoverability and navigation
* Removing distracting text (emojis, wait-three-seconds language, redundant phrases)
* Simplifying hyperlinks and providing greater clarity on where to find information. 

I hope I am able to be helpful. Let me know if there is anything else I can do to help.  I'll be happy to work on further! 😊
